page.title: 09Interview- a local farmer
page.content: Mr.Guest is a first generation farmer. He owns 64 acres,180 head of sheep and 30 head of cattle.They use sprays as fertilisers,and drugs on the animals to worm them,dip them and to treat them for disease.Chemicals are spread using a fertiliser spreader,and,sometimes a spayer is used for the weeds.All the farm is used except some land set aside for wildlife,they raise partridges there.They own a fertiliser spreader,a sprayer,afew trailors and a chain harrow,and borrow larger equipment.They only employ workers when extra help is needed.Because of the E.E.C.they now get subsidy for selling fat lambs and cattle.
